uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.client.xml

Class XClientModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.client.xml.XClientEntity
      • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.client.xml.XClientModel

  • public abstract class XClientModel
extends XClientEntity
    Represents a client-side version of the MEKON frames model, with all client/server interaction being via XML-based representations of specific actions.

    Both this class and XClientStore are designed to be used in combination with the companion XML-based server class, XServer. All encoding and decoding of the action requests and responses is handled by this set of client/server classes. Hence the extending and wrapper classes are only required to pass on the relevant documents, and never need to interpret any of the XML contained within.
